item.description:
Our introductory event is Wednesday, October 21st. Please spread the word to your colleagues and friends! Here are the details of the event:

What: Networking with Jewish professionals of all ages and sectors of the high-tech community
Cost: Free, just don't forget your business cards!
When: Wednesday, October 21st, 6:30 pm - 8:30 pm
Where: Lir, 903 Boylston St., Boston

Agenda:

6:30-7pm: Open networking
7:00-7:30 pm: Group Introductions and the launch of a mobile scavenger hunt networking game.

* Tell us about you and your professional activites
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?
* Anything you'd like to see at the next Chai Tech Wednesday event?

7:30-8 pm: Special activity using mobile technology from one of Boston's hottest start-ups.
8-8:30 pm Open networking
item.name: Chai Tech Wednesdays October Meetup
